content: 2025 SUV model: 2.0L turbo engine, 8-speed automatic, optional AWD. Estimated 30 MPG highway.
metadata: Trim: Base/Plus/Lux, advanced driver assist standard in Lux trim

content: EcoSedan: 1.5L hybrid variant yields 45 MPG combined. Lithium-ion battery in rear trunk area.
metadata: Trims: Eco, Premium Eco, battery brand: Voltix

content: EV Crossover: 300-mile range, dual-motor AWD, fast-charging in 45 minutes to 80%.
metadata: Battery capacity: 75 kWh, future over-the-air updates planned

content: Light-duty pickup truck: 3.0L diesel option or 2.5L gas turbo. Towing capacity up to 7,000 lbs.
metadata: Trim: Work, Sport, towing package standard on Sport

content: Hydrogen concept sedan: Fuel-cell rated for 350 miles, refill time ~5 minutes, zero tailpipe emissions.
